page.title: 08Clothes worn in Alburgh
page.content: { Clothes { Clothes worn, vary depending on the work to be undertaken. Of those people interviewed most wore old clothes to work on the farms. Some wore suits or similar smart clothing and changed into comfortable trousers,sweaters and shirts when at home. Denim jeans are popular for men and women as they are easy to wash and hard wearing. Ladies wore either skirts, dresses or trousers for everyday and 'best' wear. Men wore trousers, jacket shirt and tie for best and jeans or trousers and tee shirts or sweaters for casual wear. Wool,cotton and other natural fibers are used but a large amount of man made fibre such as nylon and acrilan is used in clothing mainly because of easy washing.
